title: How to Convert a PSD to a JPG in Photoshop

steps.title: Open your project in Photoshop.
steps.content: Open your project in Photoshop. You'll find the Photoshop shortcut in your Start menu or in the Applications folder in Finder. To open your project, click File > Open or right-click the project PSD file in your file manager and select Open with > Photoshop .

steps.title: Click the File tab.
steps.content: Click the File tab. It's in the upper left corner of the program window.

steps.title: Select Save As.
steps.content: Select Save As . You'll find this in the third grouping of menu options.

steps.title: Select JPG from the "Format" drop-down.
steps.content: Select JPG from the "Format" drop-down. More options will load and you can change any if you don't like the defaults. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Save and OK.
steps.content: Click Save and OK . Your file will convert from PSD to JPG once you have the format changed in the save menu. [2] X Research source
